summary: Comprehensive testing completed for ERW simulator dashboard iteration 2 after major UI redesign. All backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate (15/15 tests passed). Frontend UI fully functional with all 5 pages, navigation, charts, and interactive elements working correctly. Dashboard successfully displays 1.74B t COâ‚‚/yr total CDR from 1542 samples across 828 sampling locations and 11 basins.
passed_tests: Backend API: Dashboard Overview returns valid data (1.74B t/yr CDR, 1542 samples, 90.3% success)
Backend API: Analytics Full returns 1542 records with all required fields
Backend API: Analytics Basin Stats returns 11 basins with comprehensive data
Backend API: Analytics NICB Quality returns data quality metrics by basin
Backend API: Regions CDR returns 11 regions with CDR data
Backend API: Map Data returns 828 sampling locations with coordinates
Backend API: States CDR returns 23 states with CDR data
Backend API: Top Rivers returns ranked river data
Backend API: Feedstocks returns calcite with omega threshold 5
Backend API: Comparison returns omega threshold comparison data
Backend API: Chat functionality works with AI responses
Frontend: Analytics page loads at / with Overview tab showing TA map and basin bar charts
Frontend: All 6 Analytics tabs working - Overview, Ion Chemistry, Carbonate, Charge Balance, Saturation, CO2 Dynamics
Frontend: Ion Chemistry tab shows Ca/Mg grouped bar charts and scatter plots
Frontend: Carbonate tab shows HCO3 bar charts and scatter plots
Frontend: CO2 Dynamics tab shows pCO2 charts with 420 uatm reference line
Frontend: Simulator page loads with 6 KPI cards (Total CDR: 1.74B, Avg CDR: 2.18M, Samples: 1542, Success: 90.3%, Rock Add: 0.0012, pH: 7.73)
Frontend: Simulator feedstock selector and omega-5 button accessible
Frontend: Simulator CDR by Region chart and Top 10 Rivers table working
Frontend: Map page loads with 828 sampling locations displayed correctly
Frontend: Map color-by dropdown works with Basin/Region, Total Alkalinity, pH, CDR Potential options
Frontend: More page loads with pie chart and river rankings table
Frontend: Data page loads with complete upload form and feedstocks table
Frontend: Top navigation works for all 5 sections (Analytics, ERW Simulator, Map, More, Data)
Frontend: Chat toggle opens/closes chat widget correctly
Frontend: All data-testid attributes present for robust testing
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (15/15 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all pages, tabs, and interactive elements working)
